name: TechniCOLOR Error
description:
This game is made for mini game jam 111 with theme 'Color' and 'You are your own enemy'

In this challenging and unique bullet hell game, the player has to help the main character to survive and collect an orb of a certain color.  The orbs are created by the character itself and are constantly changing color as they bounce off the environment. 

HOW TO PLAY-

Collect the orb with the same color as the time UI and avoid other orb. You will have to collect a certain number of orbs and fill your meter to win before time runs out. Hittingwrong color orb will reset the meter.

WASD/Arrow keys to control character movement
